title: Ticket #1842: cmake PROPER support for BLAHP
description: Currently, BLAHP support can only be built as an external. It should be possible to detect for a PROPER build.
attachments:

    Attached patch will detect installed BLAHP presence for PROPER build.

    I've tested this works for the PROPER build, but would like a Condor/cmake expert to eyeball it. This is my first cmake patch.
